title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Jesse: So since you wanted someone with some common sense to chime in... The poll was done with 1003 people via phone calls, face-to-face communication, etc. The questions were asked only in swing states where the chance for that state to go with Trump or Hillary during the election was by a 10% margin. So in other words, these are not states that supported Trump OR Hillary by a considerable margin. Where I live in FL on the west coast, the support FOR trump is deafening. If 1003 people were asked here then a large majority would be against impeachment. The "study" further goes to talk about 80% of Republicans are against impeachment which suggests that the "study" or the "poll" was going out of its way to contact non-Trump supporters. That being said, >IF< it truly was targeting non-supporters, then nearly 50% is for impeachment and 50% against in the non-supportive group and that means that many of those non-supporters have switched to a supportive approach. Read between the lines on these articles and notice the actual facts.
